vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Planned Development Subdistrict for an art or craft production facility use on property zoned Subdistrict 3 within Planned Development District No. 317, the Cedars Area Special Purpose District, on the south corner of Griffin Street, east and South Ervay Street
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval, subject to a revised Exhibit 317A (Property Descriptions) and conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval, subject to a revised Exhibit 317A (Property Descriptions) and conditions
Z234-240(LG/MP)
